description.zh: Chat with PDF 是一个轻量级的大型语言模型（LLM）应用，通过检索增强生成（RAG）技术让用户与 PDF 文档进行交互。用户可上传 PDF 并针对其内容提问，系统将提供准确且上下文相关的问题回答。该项目仅用 30 行 Python 代码实现，并使用 Streamlit 构建了简洁的交互界面。
description.en: Chat with PDF is a lightweight LLM-powered application that enables users to interact with PDF documents using Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG). It allows uploading PDFs and asking questions about their content, providing accurate, context-aware answers. Built in just 30 lines of Python, it leverages Streamlit for a simple, interactive interface.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 通过自然语言查询实现对复杂 PDF 内容的直观交互
- 利用人工智能减少从文档中提取信息所需的人工操作
- 轻量高效，代码简洁，依赖少，易于部署

## 功能列表:

- 上传 PDF 文档
- 针对 PDF 内容提问
- 基于 RAG 和选定的大语言模型获取准确答案
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Enables intuitive interaction with complex PDF content through natural language queries
- Reduces manual effort in extracting information from documents using AI
- Lightweight and easy to set up with minimal code and dependencies

## Features:

- Upload a PDF document
- Ask questions about the content of the PDF
- Get accurate answers using RAG and the selected LLM
